arts.ttl: Kairat Almaty vs Real Madrid LIVE: Güler and Mastantuono start Los Blancos face UCL clash in Kazakhstan
arts.sum:
Kairat XI: Kalmurza(GK); Mata, Sorokin, Martynovich, Tapalov; Gromkyo, Arad, Kasabulat, Mrynskiy; Jorginho, Satpaev

Real Madrid XI: Courtois(GK); Garcia, Alaba, Huijsen, Asencio; Tchoumanei, Ceballos; Vinicius Jr (C), Guler, Mastantuono; Mbappe.

arts.ttl: FC Kairat vs Real Madrid: Confirmed Starting Lineup For Champions League Clash
arts.sum: The first was an enforced one, with Raul Asencio starting at right-back, as Dani Carvajal was suspended for the game after receiving a red card against Marseille. In the front three, Kylian Mbappe starts his eighth consecutive game of the season, one of just two to do so this season, with goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois the other.

arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid starting lineup against Kairat Almaty – Asencio and Alaba start
arts.sum: Following an embarassing defeat at the hands of Atletico Madrid, Real Madrid will look to bounce back to winning ways as they take on Kairat Almaty this afternoon. This will be the club’s second Champions League match of the season, having started the campaign with a narrow win over Marseille. arts.ttl: Report – Xabi Alonso likely to rest Real Madrid scoring machine vs Kairat Almaty
arts.sum: Real Madrid have undertaken a long journey to Kazakhstan to lock horns with Kairat Almaty in the UEFA Champions League and the game later today is expected to be a challenging one. In terms of pure footballing and individual quality, the Spanish giants are clear favourites and several levels above their opponents. arts.ttl: UEFA dismisses Real Madrid complaints about Kairat Almaty pitch – report
arts.sum: Real Madrid’s concerns about the condition of the turf at Kairat Almaty’s stadium have been rejected by UEFA ahead of their Matchday 2 clash in the European Cup group stage, according to Defensa Central. Los Blancos had formally requested changes, arguing the pitch could negatively affect their play, but Europe’s governing body has confirmed that […] The post UEFA dismisses Real Madrid complaints about Kairat Almaty pitch – report appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.sum: Kairat Almaty forward Jorginho recently spoke with AS ahead of a historic Champions League tie against Real Madrid. arts.sum: Real Madrid travel to Kazakhstan looking to bounce back from their devastating 5-2 derby defeat to Atletico Madrid as they face first-time Champions League participants Kairat Almaty on Tuesday.
